verses.verse: A Psalm of David<WH1732>. Judge<WH8199> me, O LORD<WH3068>; for I have walked<WH1980> in mine integrity<WH8537>: I have trusted<WH982> also in the LORD<WH3068>; therefore I shall not slide<WH4571>.
Examine<WH974> me, O LORD<WH3068>, and prove<WH5254> me; try<WH6884> my reins<WH3629> and my heart<WH3820>.
For thy lovingkindness<WH2617> is before mine eyes<WH5869>: and I have walked<WH1980> in thy truth<WH571>.
I have not sat<WH3427> with vain<WH7723> persons<WH4962>, neither will I go in<WH935> with dissemblers<WH5956>.
I have hated<WH8130> the congregation<WH6951> of evil doers<WH7489>; and will not sit<WH3427> with the wicked<WH7563>.
I will wash<WH7364> mine hands<WH3709> in innocency<WH5356>: so will I compass<WH5437> thine altar<WH4196>, O LORD<WH3068>:
That I may publish<WH8085> with the voice<WH6963> of thanksgiving<WH8426>, and tell<WH5608> of all thy wondrous works<WH6381>.
LORD<WH3068>, I have loved<WH157> the habitation<WH4583> of thy house<WH1004>, and the place<WH4725> where thine honour<WH3519> dwelleth<WH4908>. where: Heb. of the tabernacle of thy honour
Gather<WH622> not my soul<WH5315> with sinners<WH2400>, nor my life<WH2416> with bloody<WH1818> men<WH582>: Gather: or, Take not away bloody: Heb. men of blood
In whose hands<WH3027> is mischief<WH2154>, and their right hand<WH3225> is full<WH4390> of bribes<WH7810>. full: Heb. filled with
But as for me, I will walk<WH3212> in mine integrity<WH8537>: redeem<WH6299> me, and be merciful<WH2603> unto me.
My foot<WH7272> standeth<WH5975> in an even place<WH4334>: in the congregations<WH4721> will I bless<WH1288> the LORD<WH3068>.
